amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds from being utilized by mobile Visible Intermodal Protection and Response teams (VIPR).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the TSA or a Visible Intermodal Protection and Response (VIPR) team to conduct a security screening other than pursuant to section 44901 of title 49, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 247 (Roll no. 201).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 247 (Roll no. 201).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Garrett.
